mapper.update:
update t_article
c_article_title = #{cArticleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_article_tag = #{cArticleTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_article_imgs = #{cArticleImgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_create_time = #{tCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
t_update_time = #{tUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
n_create_id = #{nCreateId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
c_article_content = #{cArticleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
n_count_comment=#{nCountComment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
n_top = #{nTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where n_article_id = #{nArticleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_article set c_article_title = #{cArticleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_article_tag = #{cArticleTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_article_imgs = #{cArticleImgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_create_time = #{tCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t_update_time = #{tUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, n_create_id = #{nCreateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, c_article_content = #{cArticleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, n_count_comment = #{nCountComment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, n_top =#{nTop,jdbcType=INTEGER} where n_article_id = #{nArticleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM t_article
and n_article_type=#{articleType}
and ( c_article_title like CONCAT('%','${keywords}','%' ) )
and DATE_FORMAT(t_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(t_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
